name: ThunderStuck
description:
It's a bad day to be a cloud.

A thunderstorm has started while a bunch of birds are migrating! Oh no!

Control the cloud to avoid striking them with lightning!

Controls

  • Arrow Buttons to move
  • Hold Space to charge up your lightning strike

Twitter: @johnnygossdev

Music from OneManSymphony:

https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/album/royalty-free-soundtrack-collection
